name: DNA mash-up
description:
Our game is an educational simulator. The player mashes up two creatures and gets their own hybrid pet.  Afterwards, the player will have to take care of it: feed it, keep it healthy and clean, and entertain it!

In addition, the game will present different educational facts about the animals.

Credits:

  • Ksenia Jevsejeva - lead designer, animator
  • Leyli Bunyadzade- artist, UI designer
  • Samuel Hippopen- programmer
  • Burak Poyraz - project manager
  • Robin Lindkvist- artist, sound designer
